mapper.select: select distinct c.category_id from challengeparticipation as cp inner join challenge as c on cp.challenge_id = c.id where cp.user_id = #{userId} and cp.status = 'SUCCESS' and c.duration_weeks = 1

select c.id as challenge_id, c.title, c.start_date, c.end_date, cat.name as categoryName from challenge c inner join category as cat on c.category_id = cat.id where current_date < c.start_date and c.duration_weeks = 1 order by c.start_date asc

select c.id as challenge_id, c.title, c.start_date, c.end_date, cat.name as categoryName from challenge c inner join category as cat on c.category_id = cat.id where current_date < c.start_date and c.duration_weeks = 4 and c.category_id = #{categoryId} order by c.start_date asc
select id, title, description, start_date, end_date, entry_fee, target_count, target_amount, type, duration_weeks, category_id from challenge where id = #{id}
